reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and comfortable, with a good fit and perfect for Halloween. The softness receives mixed feedback, with some finding it very soft while others say it's not the softest. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some noting it runs a little big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Halloween shirt
items.body: This sweater is SO cute, comfortable, and perfect for Halloween. They did send me the pumpkin shirt instead of the bat shirt and it runs super big. Read more
items.author: TANYA R SWEET

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute
items.body: Fits as expected and very soft. Perfect for October. Read more
items.author: Cheryl B.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad
items.body: I got the brown with the bats in an XL. The design is super cute, and perfect for the fall. So far, it's pretty soft (just came today so haven't washed it yet), the thing that sorts bothers me, is the armpit area. It hangs lower than I was expecting, so lifting the airs feels a little awkward. I don't want to return, cause it is cute, so it's something I'll get used to. Read more
items.author: gena

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cool sweater
items.body: Material is yarn which is to be expected. It is soft but I recommend and undershirt if you have sensory issues. I would recommend one size up but I'm an oversized shirt girly so use your best judgement on that. Love the detail. Perfect for the bat girl in your life. Read more
items.author: Chris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect Halloween sweater
items.author: charity vezie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spooky business casual
items.body: Love this sweater. So cute and able to wear it at work. Spooky business casual! Read more
items.author: Deanna

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not soft
items.body: Returned. Material was not soft and fit a little to snug for my liking. Read more
items.author: Kelnron05

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs a little big
items.body: I ordered a large based on size chart, I could have gone eith a medium. Read more
items.author: Mom21Son

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 457 Brown, 492 Red, 973 Brown, 492 Green, 414 Beige, 414 Pink, 456 Deep Orange, 973 Grey, 456 Black, 493 Wine Red, 805 Black, 414 White, 492 Beige, 973 Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
